categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic military bases

nodes.text: The Alliance to Restore the Republic established a temporary outpost on Horox III, a location deep in the Outer Rim Territories. Following the Siege on Tureen VII, Task Force 99 undertook a mission to the outpost. The team destroyed the outpost, leaving a message for anyone who would come back. The Heroes of Yavin arrived afterward and discovered the destruction. Fearing discovery, they did not stay to fully bury the dead troops, but they did pile them together for a cremation.
